game.title: A Quest to the Enchanted Forest
game.objective: Discover the ancient artifact hidden in the forest ruins
game.description: You have been tasked by the village elder, Elara, to retrieve a powerful amulet that protects the kingdom from evil forces.
game.reward: The amulet of protection and a hero's welcome upon your return

task.objective: Follow the old map to find the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Search for clues in the village archives and seek advice from the wise wizard, Zephyr.
